# Number of lines of code in enable: 5
sub enable {
  my $context = shift;
  QuotedString::enableQuotes($context);
  QuotedString::enableAdd($context);
}

sub enableAdd {
  my $context = shift;
  $context->operators->set('+' => {class=>"QuotedString::BOP::add"});
}
public method QuotedString::enableQuotes (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in enableQuotes: 6
sub enableQuotes {
  my $context = shift;
  $context->{parser}{String} = 'QuotedString';
  bless $context->{_strings}, 'QuotedString::Data';
  $context->strings->update;
}
public method QuotedString::new (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in new: 11
sub new {
  my $self = shift; my ($equation,$value,$ref) = @_;
  my $str = $self->SUPER::new(@_);
  unless ($str->{equation}{context}{strings}{$str->{value}}) {
    $equation->Error("Missing close quote",$ref) if $str->{value} eq '"';
    $str->{value} =~ s/^"(.*)"$/$1/;
    $str->{value} =~ s/\\"/"/g;
    $str->{isQuoted} = 1;
  }
  return $str;
}
public method QuotedString::string (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in string: 8
sub string {
  my $self = shift; my $string = $self->SUPER::string(@_);
  if ($self->{isQuoted}) {
    $string =~ s/"/\\"/g;
    $string = '"'.$string.'"';
  }
  return $string
}
